summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3829 for the improvement of Halleck Avenue Southwest, from 53rd Avenue Southwest to Bonair Drive; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47062, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
